data.title: Emptage Hallett
data.meta_description: Laura Fraser has extensive television credits that include, 'Lydia' in BREAKING BAD and BETTER CALL SAUL, TRACES for UKTV, and THE PACT for BBC.
data.text:
Back to clients

Laura Fraser

Laura has extensive television credits, including SINGLE FATHER with David Tennant, LIP SERVICE for the BBC, ‘Lydia’ in BREAKING BAD and BETTER CALL SAUL, ‘Reagan’ in THE BLACK BOX, ‘Margaret’ in CASTLES IN THE SKY, ‘Patricia’ in FOREVER, ‘Hannah’ in COCKED, ITV’s six-part drama THE LOCH and international Emmy nominated PETER AND WENDY.

Further credits include BBC dramas ONE OF US and THE MISSING, for which she won the BAFTA Scotland Award for ‘Best Actress- Television’.

Film credits include DARK ENCOUNTER, TALES FROM THE LODGE, BEATS, A KNIGHT’S TALE, THE BOYS ARE BACK, FLUTTER, I AM NOT A SERIAL KILLER with Christopher Lloyd, and IN THE CLOUD.

Most recently, Laura starred in 1 & 2 of Irvine Welsh’s CRIME, the six-part BBC series THE PACT and series 1 & 2 of UKTV drama TRACES.

Laura can next be seen leading Channel 4’s brand-new detective drama PATIENCE.
